S.FORM: pakatua djilung a tjaucikeL
pakatoa djilong a tjaocikeL
izua za tjawcikel na sepaiwan a namayatucu, kasicuayan aza 'adav a cemas namangetjez ikacauan, sa 'emecilu tu drusa,
izoa za tjawcikel na sepaiwan a namayatoco, kasicoayan aza 'adav a cemas namangetjez ikacaoan, sa 'emecilo to drosa,
manu djumaken na macidilj a kikasikasiv a cawcau, kacuin a pasauma' sa pitjaladji ta djilung a ljemengua',
mano djomaken na macidilj a kikasikasiv a cawcao, kacoin a pasaoma' sa pitjaladji ta djilong a ljemengoa',

manu izua ka ita 'adav, mapatjeljar ta tjeljar na 'adav aza drusa 'ecilu i tjaladj ta djilung, manu venuak ta macidilj a u'aljay kata macidilj a vavayan. aza drusa 'ecilu, pai aicu a u'aljay kata vavayan mavananga sevalitan na paiwan aya.

mano izoa ka ita 'adav, mapatjeljar ta tjeljar na 'adav aza drosa 'ecilo i tjaladj ta djilong, mano venoak ta macidilj a o'aljay kata macidilj a vavayan. aza drosa 'ecilo, pai aico a o'aljay kata vavayan mavananga sevalitan na paiwan aya.
aza masanitjaljanga a pakatua djilung a milimilingan mayatucu, izua ita 'adav kacemalivat i kavulungan a 'adav, manu djemumak ta nguangua' aravac a ita djilung i padayin,
aza masanitjaljanga a pakatoa djilong a milimilingan mayatoco, izoa ita 'adav kacemalivat i kavolongan a 'adav, mano djemomak ta ngoangoa' aravac a ita djilong i padayin,
pai 'emcilu a pitjaladj ta djilung, sa'ivu ta marecekelj a kamavanan tu ljemakev ta djilung, manu venuak ta macidjilj a vavayan aza 'ecilu, aicu a vavayan mavananga sevalitan na se paiwan aya,
pai 'emcilo a pitjaladj ta djilong, sa'ivo ta marecekelj a kamavanan to ljemakev ta djilong, mano venoak ta macidjilj a vavayan aza 'ecilo, aico a vavayan mavananga sevalitan na se paiwan aya,
'au aicu a kamavanan namasan ljemakeljakev a cemas na paiwan kata namasan pazangazangal a vecik na paiwan.
'ao aico a kamavanan namasan ljemakeljakev a cemas na paiwan kata namasan pazangazangal a vecik na paiwan.
manasika aicu a tjawcikel na sepaiwan a pakatua djilung, mavan a kinaizuanan na tjasevalitan i kacauan aya,
manasika aico a tjawcikel na sepaiwan a pakatoa djilong, mavan a kinaizoanan na tjasevalitan i kacaoan aya,

a tja'alja'aljan nu 'ivu, nu uri lemindjelj ta va'uan a 'inaljan a mamazangiljan, tjara pakaizua sakamaya ta djilung, ayatua aicu a djilung makaya a ljemakev tua tja'inaljan tua tjakinacemkeljan aya mamazangiljan nu'ivu,

a tja'alja'aljan no 'ivo, no ori lemindjelj ta va'oan a 'inaljan a mamazangiljan, tjara pakaizoa sakamaya ta djilong, ayatoa aico a djilong makaya a ljemakev toa tja'inaljan toa tjakinacemkeljan aya mamazangiljan no'ivo,

manasika kemasicuay izua sakamaya tjawcikel a pakatua djilung na i pasaviri a paiwan, 'aw aicu a djilung liav a rinukunukuz a pitjuma' na mareka mamazangiljan. aicu a djilung sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan,

manasika kemasicoay izoa sakamaya tjawcikel a pakatoa djilong na i pasaviri a paiwan, 'aw aico a djilong liav a rinokonokoz a pitjoma' na mareka mamazangiljan. aico a djilong sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan,
aicu a djilung sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan, nu tjaliav a rinukuz a djilung makeljang tu tjapuanema, saka naljiavavav a 'iniladjan itua kinamamazangiljanan niamadju.
aico a djilong sinan pazangal aravac na mamazangiljan, no tjaliav a rinokoz a djilong makeljang to tjapoanema, saka naljiavavav a 'iniladjan itoa kinamamazangiljanan niamadjo.
kasicuayan amin a mamazangiljan mana makaya kipudjilung, ljakua tucuanga ini ka manu amin a mamazangiljan a makaya a kipudjilung,
kasicoayan amin a mamazangiljan mana makaya kipodjilong, ljakoa tocoanga ini ka mano amin a mamazangiljan a makaya a kipodjilong,
ayata tjuruvuanga maca'u a masengseng ta djilung tucu.
ayata tjorovoanga maca'o a masengseng ta djilong toco.
'aw aicu a pakatua kinasizuan na djilung, kemeljang a mapuljat a i pasaviri a paiwan, izua angata a pacacapilj kata sicuayan a tjaucikel kata milimilingan na sevalitan,
'aw aico a pakatoa kinasizoan na djilong, kemeljang a mapoljat a i pasaviri a paiwan, izoa angata a pacacapilj kata sicoayan a tjaocikel kata milimilingan na sevalitan,

aicu a mareka masengsengseng ta djilung, nu malalang ta djilung, tjara vencik ta kamavanan ta tjeljar na 'adav a pipalingulj ta djilung, aza patarevan sinipa'aljay kata kipa'enetj kata ljemakev siniayan.

aico a mareka masengsengseng ta djilong, no malalang ta djilong, tjara vencik ta kamavanan ta tjeljar na 'adav a pipalingolj ta djilong, aza patarevan sinipa'aljay kata kipa'enetj kata ljemakev siniayan.
'aw aicu a djilung maretimaljimalji, a sinanpazangal na sepaiwan a mamazangiljan, a tjaljavavavan a kakavelian a djilung mavan a dredretan.
'aw aico a djilong maretimaljimalji, a sinanpazangal na sepaiwan a mamazangiljan, a tjaljavavavan a kakavelian a djilong mavan a dredretan.
